document_data.name: Lorton Ironstone
document_data.mainbody: '''Lorton Ironstone''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Lorton Ironstone looked much like one of the War Wizards who confronted [[Elminster Aumar]], the fugitive, at [[Tethgard]], surviving only by fleeing.
document_data.Possessions:
Lorton Ironstone wielded an [[enchanted]] [[wand]] that caused short-term paralysis on its targets, almost certainly akin to a ''[[wand of paralyzation]]''.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|120|11}}

He also carried an enchanted [[dagger]] that glowed upon command.
document_data.History: Lorton Ironstone encountered Elminster when the latter attempted to sneak into [[Castle Obarskyr]], [[Suzail]], in {{yearlink|1479}}; after trading no end of meaningless words, he took a [[black pepper]] bomb to the face, which disabled him. After reinforcements arrived, the ghost of [[Alusair Obarskyr]], princess-regent from a century prior, walked through him to disable him completely, thus rescuing Elminster.
